name: html-inflect
description: Cleanup, modify, and save messy HTML

scripts.build-browser: browserify src/inflect.js -s html-inflect -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ] | derequire > dist/inflect.browser.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build-browser & npm run build-node
